name: bee.
description:
BEE. - to bee or not to bee

To play the game you have to activate the game area by clicking into it. The bee can be moved left and right by the cursor keys. Collect pollen from the flowers, and avoid the insecticide. The third skull makes the bees extinct. Save the bee, save the planet.

A game by Szabó Gerle

Moholy-Nagy University of Art and Design/ MOME media design BA2

2020
